On December 2 (KST), the 15th Melon Music Awards were held to celebrate 2023’s greatest K-Pop accomplishments.
| Melon

articles.title: Macaulay Culkin gets emotional at Walk of Fame ceremony - WBNS 10TV
articles.description: Macaulay Culkin reunited with his "Home Alone" on-screen mom Catherine O'Hara at a ceremony revealing his star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame on Friday. Culki...
